function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate public engagement in discussing and embracing the required adjustment in house design","Impact":"Increased risk of future epidemics and pandemics due to unpreparedness in the built environment","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns, community involvement, incentives for developers","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, virtual design tools, building information modeling (BIM)","People":"General public, developers, government","Owner":"Government, community organizations"},{"Description":"COVID fatigue leading to laissez-faire attitude and disregard for public health measures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks due to lack of adherence to public health guidelines","Mitigation":"Targeted public health campaigns, enforcement of guidelines, mental health support","Technologies":"Health tracking apps, telemedicine, mental health apps","People":"General public, government, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Reversion to pre-pandemic behaviors and lifestyles without adequate preparedness for future pandemics","Impact":"Decreased resilience against future epidemics and pandemics, increased vulnerability to disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Education on pandemic preparedness, investment in public health infrastructure, policy incentives for preparedness","Technologies":"Online education platforms, public health surveillance systems, telehealth services","People":"General public, government, healthcare providers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
